basics.name: Megan Storie
basics.label: Technical Writer
basics.summary: I am an experienced technical writer with a history of working in Tech and Higher Ed.

work.name: Appfire, Burlington MS
work.summary: Developed end-to-end technical documentation covering the entirety of dozens of unique applications. Amended existing application documentation in a timely manner for updates/migrations. Became a cross-communication expert dealing with Engineering, Customer Sat, and Marketing teams concurrently to always ensure the right messaging is public-facing.

work.name: University of North Texas, Denton TX
work.summary: Implemented a stewardship program in the liberal arts college at UNT, connecting hundreds of donors with their scholarship recipients. Managed communications across the liberal arts college between the departments and development team.

work.name: TIAA Bank, Lewisville TX
work.summary: Navigated several banking administrative systems to service clients' accounts. Assisted clients in opening new accounts with the company.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: University of North Texas, Denton, Texas

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
